review_text: Wow! What a great home! This pristine tiny home has everything you could need. The house is beautifully decorated and fully stocked. The host was very responsive and flexible. The instructions were readily available that included local recommendations. I would highly recommend this place and will try to book this if we come back this way in the future. You will love staying here!
We had events going on in Bemidji and Itasca Park, and this was a nice in-between spot...perfect for my wife and me. Loved the rural quiet.

A great place to kick up our feet for a night after a few days of hiking. The entire space was SO clean and felt brand new! Also, as someone who is chilly all the time I appreciated the cozy blanket on the bed.

It was a very nice house. Loved staying there it was out in the country. Beautiful scenery. Not far from town to everything. We rented bicycles and rode around Lake Bemidji. We just had a blast. We were celebrating our 25th anniversary. Definitely recommend to all. We will be back for sure.
wonderful home, thank you for sharing it with me. great location, the farms make the sunsets and moon look great

Matt’s place is such an adorable tiny home! We absolutely loved the aesthetic of his place, we could tell everything was very thought out inside. It was close enough to downtown Bemidji, yet tucked in its own peaceful little spot. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a nice place to stay while in Bemidji.

This is a beautiful little cottage, easily accessible to downtown Bemidji and the surrounding beauty of the north woods. Everything was perfect, from the comfortable, neat-as-a-pin house to the starry skies at night. We hope to come back!
Awesome stay!

Quiet, relaxing country setting, with a short drive to Bemidji. Kitchen was stocked with the basic cooking kettles for cooking, with nice appliances and a huge fridge. Beds were clean and comfortable. Loved the soaking tub. A nice patio table and chairs on the back deck overlooking the pond would have been used if our weather wouldn't have been chilly. Will definitely stay again when we are in this area
Super cozy little place! Enjoyed my weekend stay, and hosts were super responsive!
Cute little place in a private setting. Not too far from town and other activities. Great place!

Beautiful place, quiet and tucked away but still close to town. The tub shower can be a bit challenging to get in and out of so keep that in mind if you have mobility issues. We would stay here again!
We had a great time!
Very nice tiny house. Highly recommend and will be back in the future. Very beautiful inside and out. Also in walking distance to a fishing lake.
The host was quick to respond to any messages we sent, the home was cute and secluded, and overall was just exactly what we were looking for!
Very nice warm and cozy. Great space for a retreat!
Cute place!
Great location - visited Itasca State Park and Bemidji - and perfect size for my family of 3. Beds were very comfortable!
The Blue Mountain Cabin was such a nice place to stay. I would definitely recommend it, and would stay there again.
Beautiful view and modern style.

We spent our Anniversary here and loved the relaxation and quiet. Town was close with lots to do. Siam Spa has a Fabulous couples massage, Tetto Bene is a must, 209 Excellent and Keg & Cork will round out a Great time!!!!!
We loved this little house! This place was perfect for my family! We will for sure hope to book here again in the future!
Small, quiet and clean! We saw the nothern lights from the drive!
Heather and Matt were very responsive and accommodating. The house was clean and easy to locate.
Great little house out in the country, but close enough to downtown. Would stay again!

We were so delighted to have found this little treasure. So adorable and cozy. Could watch the sunset and sunrise. It really was a home away from home. So many windows and land and geese and thoughtfully appointed. If you like baths, the tub was perfection. Matt and Heather were quick to reply when we had a question. We had a tough weekend tending to some family matters, which made coming “home” to this little peace of heaven even sweeter. Heather told us there were toys in the ottoman which was a wonderful find for my 2 year old granddaughter. She was also kept busy climbing up and down the bunk beds. She and I curled up for naps and bedtime in the bottom bunk. Thank you for providing such a warm and convenient place for us.
This Tiny Home was comfy and cozy. 10 minutes from Bemidji and plenty to do and see. We enjoyed the stay and our hosts were always responsive and helpfull!

This little home was just perfect for 3 sisters that needed a peaceful getaway! Super clean and cozy. It was nice to have a few condiments and waters in the fridge. We really appreciate how clean and tidy the place was too. Very nice to be able to walk along the lakes and watch the swans in the morning. Our hosts were prompt in replying to my questions too. So lovely to have a little autumn time together!
Host were very responsive and friendly! Was a great spot for a little get away.

The house was super cozy! Everything you need for cooking and sleeping is provided and all very comfortable! Great decor also! 10 minutes away from amazing restaurants and downtown bemidji! Also felt very private and quiet! We will definitely be back again! Highly recommend!

Peaceful cabin with a great soaking tub! 15 minute drive from downtown Bemidji, 15ish from Itasca State Park. Far enough from the city to feel "country". Clean, comfortable, modern space with good amenities. Hosts were very responsive. Definitely would stay again.
Very beautiful little home near Bemidji city.
Great place, very quiet. I really enjoyed my stay.
My partner and I loved their tiny home! It was a great mini vacation to try out a new space. Hosts are friendly and respond quickly to any questions. We'll definitely be back!
What a wonderful stay! We loved Matt’s place and would go back in a heartbeat. Would highly recommend it to anyone!
Extremely responsive and wonderful hosts, the place was peaceful and well kept. We would definitely come back for a stay with Matt and Heather.
It was a beautiful relaxing getaway to just have a weekend away from busy life! Carla is the sweetest host so accommodating!

Happy to add to the other great reviews of Carla’s delighful little cabin. It was the perfect spot for my solo woods time, but would be super for a couple’s getaway too. Hot tub with views of lake and sunset was a highlight. Carla also had wonderful restaurant recs and went above and beyond with her thoughtful guest amenities. I will definitely book a return visit.
We always love staying here. Looking forward to next time. If you’re looking for a quiet, private cozy retreat in an absolutely gorgeous setting, give Carla’s place a try!
Carla was a very kind and responsive host. Place was beautiful and well described.
Great stay!! Would recommend for a weekend getaway!

Carla is a kind and attentive host. This was our second stay with her and it was just as delightful as the first. She was willing to accommodate our need for a late check in, sought out specialty items for dietary restrictions and was thoughtful throughout. She is responsive without hovering, attentive without restrictive expectations. She is a delightful person and the stay was peaceful and rejuvenating.
Great host, very helpful. Beautiful place with all the amenities, very peaceful. Amazing surroundings.
Wonderful stay, as always. We come to Bemidji several times a year, and will always check to see if Carla’s place is open. Can’t wait until we get to stay again!

Was the perfect weekend get away and a beatuful place to spend a few days. Very private i brought my fourwheeler on a trailer she had cleared a space for it to be parked while we stayed it was amazing!
Nice relaxing atmosphere. The place was very clean and well cared for.

We come to Bemidji several times a year. I've said it before, and it's still true: We will always stay at Carla's if it is available. The privacy and the beautiful setting make it the best value in the area.

What a nice place to stay! Excellent accommodations. So peaceful and very clean. Carla has put much care and thought into her cottage. We felt very welcome and would recommend this place to others for sure.
Great get away place, perfect for a couple. Hot tub is a great to enjoy nature and outdoors.
Carla was friendly. The check in process was very smooth. The cabin was as described. My husband and I had a very relaxing private stay.
A beautiful place to unwind and relax! Loved the view from the hot tub and the dock. Would love to come back and spend more time on the lake.
It was a great little place to stay. Beautiful spot, cute fire pit, clean nice hot tub, and things to recreate with. It was quite enjoyable. Carla was a wonderful host.

Quite possibly the best Airbnb experience we’ve ever had. Carla was an amazing host - she was proactive with communication/instructions and incredibly kind and welcoming. The breakfast basket was such a wonderful extra touch, especially if you enjoy starting your days early with a busy schedule to take advantage of the area!
The location was perfect - quiet, serene, and absolutely beautiful - all while being just a short drive to Bemidji and lots of other places to explore in the area!
The suite itself was cozy, cute, and perfectly clean. The outside area and extra amenities were fantastic. We used the hot tub every night (cleanest hot tub ever!) and spent lots of time on the dock/lake.
We really felt at home here and were sad we didn’t book a longer stay - we will absolutely be coming back! Thank you for everything Carla!
Grantwood Cottage is an oasis by the lake. It was so peaceful and beautiful here and Carla is an excellent host. I loved swimming in Grant Lake and soaking in the hot tub after a day of exploring.
The stay was great, all the amenities were available. We even caught fish at the dock too. It was a very relaxing and fun environment with plenty to do.
it was beautiful and had great activities. it was relaxing and very secluded. would stay again.
Such a beautiful property with great amenities and Carla is very sweet!

Carla’s place on the lake was perfect for the two of us. It is just a few minutes from Bemidji and all its activities. It is only half an hour from Itasca State Park where we spent an enjoyable day. We also spent a day sitting on the deck watching the sunset and soaking in the hot tub. Our visit could not have been better.
Tranquil lakeside hideaway with kayaks and hot tub!
It was great getaway for two!

Such a beautiful little hideaway from all the noise. In the middle of the woods with the view of the lake. We went fishing right on the lake and cooked up our own fish which was so delicious! The host was so friendly and very respectful of our privacy especially with the private space being an attachment to the main house. The hot tub was also a hit. I highly recommend!!
It was a beautiful relaxing place for a getaway!
A little bit of heaven is exactly what it was. Quiet, relaxing and full of wildlife. Carla greeted us on arrival and was a wonderful host. Thank you for everything, it was perfect.

Carla’s place is our favorite place to stay. Secluded, surrounded by nature and so comfortable. When we come to Bemidji, which we do quite often, we always check first to see if Carla‘s place is available.

A cozy getaway for the winter with a stunning view. The space was clean and the hot tub was perfect. The little breakfast basket was generous and Carla was friendly and the options available will definitely have us coming back for the summer.
Great place and Carla was extremely accommodating and a great host! thoroughly enjoyed staying at this airbnb. great place!! my friend and i will definitely be coming back!!
We come to Bemidji many times a year. If Carla’s place is available, it is where we will stay. The beautiful view and the peacefulness are things you won’t find any other place.
The stay was great! The hot tub was perfect for the cold and the area is a ton of fun!
Carla was bery nice and helpful. she made it a point to be there and give up the orrentation of the place and the hot tub. A beatiful weekend get away!

Carla's place is Quiet and very scenic! the wildlife around the home was everywhere. we saw everything from Deer and turkeys to Flying Squirrels while we sat in her beautiful hot tub! The deer were close enough to touch and the flying squirrels fed right next to us. we could even hear wolves howling in the distance across the lake! over all we really enjoyedour stay and would love to go back some time soon!

We have stayed several nights at Carla's place, and will absolutely do so again, as this is easily my favorite Airbnb venue. It is cozy, quiet, secluded and private, but most of all, Carla's place is the most beautiful Northwoods setting you can imagine. It is nestled in a grove of huge Norway Pine overlooking a beautiful lake, and if that were not enough, the deer that greeted us each night as well as the endless variety of birds to watch at the feeders while we were sitting in the luxurious hot tub make this a destination site if you are headed for the area.
Place was awesome, very clean and neat, had everything we needed. Would go back tomorrow no questions asked
The unit was exactly as advertised. I appreciated the generous options for snacks and breakfast treats. The hot tub was immaculately clean with a gorgeous view.
Carla’s place was very peaceful. We loved the kayaks on the quiet lake, which was a short walk away. The outdoor hot tub was a perfect end to the day.

My husband and I stayed here for a weekend to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Carla was very friendly and greeted us upon arrival. She had a sweet basket and wine waiting for us when we walked in. We enjoyed the hot tub numerous times while watching the lake and everything nature has to offer. We took the kayaks out and also fished off the dock a few times. It's the perfect weekend getaway if you're looking for a cozy, peaceful and beautiful place. We highly recommend it!
Amazing location. Gorgeous landscape and the stars are beautiful at night down by the lake. Carla is hospitable and very nice to work with.

Wonderful, relaxing getaway. The hot tub views are amazing. Carla provides everything you would need for your stay. Wilton is a nice little town and ATV trails take you right to Leonard for a pit stop. Will definitely stay again!
Fantastic little getaway! Very clean, awesome snacks, and cozy while only steps from the lake. And of course the hot tub is an amazing plus.

We wished we could have stayed longer. The view, the clean, comfortable rooms, the quiet, the loons, the view, the wind gently whispering in the trees, the HOT TUB, and did I mention the view? As close to paradise as you can get. Thanks so much, Carla!

Highly recommend. This was my second stay at this property, and I know I'll be back. It's extremely comfortable, quiet, and relaxing. The host is incredibly thoughtful, which you'll find evidenced in the details of how the apartment is outfitted and how easy it is to interact with her. I sometimes feel like AirBnB offerings overpromise and underdeliver. Carla's place is EXACTLY the opposite, more than you'd expect.
Excellent place to say! The location is also so peaceful, relaxing, and fun!

This place is absolutely amazing! Carla was so nice and helpful and we felt like we had a ton of privacy. The views are incredible, the lake, the trees! So beautiful! I would definitely stay here again! Cute and cozy cabin with nice cabin decor. For my first trip up north, it met all my expectations and more. Just stay here, you won’t regret it.

This place is amazing. If you are looking for piece and quiet with a lake property twist this place is for you. Great little retreat. Both units are very unique and cozy. It is definitely a very chill atmosphere.
What a beautiful place!! You won't regret staying here.

Such a perfect property, and such a personable host. Everything was just perfect. We enjoyed kayaking, biking, the amazing view and even sounds of the loons on the lake. Hope to come back and enjoy again someday.
Was a very peaceful and relaxing stay! Would recommend to anyone!

Beautiful place for a couple to stay! Unreal balance of Serenity and convenience to bemidji. Would highly recommend. Also if your one of those people who prefer a more private and secluded experience you will definitely appreciate.

Carla offers an amazing serene get away in the north woods. Cute cabin, beautiful lake, surrounded by gorgeous tall pines. The hot tub is amazing, we felt welcomed and it was so peaceful. Perfect place for some self care!

Carla was a rockstar! Very accommodating and kind. Her home is BEAUTIFUL, and I can’t rave enough about the views from her property. Hot tub was exceptionally clean and the perfect spot to watch the sunset. I also forgot my toothbrush and she brought me one over right away. I’d definitely book this spot again :)
Beautiful spot! Nice place.

Gorgeous property and beautiful space. Cozy suite for a weekend getaway! The breakfast basket was super fun and perfect for a light breakfast. The hot tub was amazing on a very cold winter day! Will stay again if in the area, Carla was a super hostess!
What a great place to stay in the Bemidji area. Carla is a superb host and the location cannot be beat! SO BEAUTIFUL!

This was the perfect get away for my husband and I. We enjoyed skiing at local trails and soaking in the hot tub with beautiful scenery after. We also enjoyed cooking in and the place was perfectly stocked for that. Spotless and nice personal touches, we’ve already recommended to friends and will be back!

We loved it. The place was great. Beautiful spot on the lake. Hot tub was really nice. Everything was very clean and tidy. It was a great little getaway. Comfy beds, cozy fireplace. Thanks for a great stay!

Relaxing, private, and close to many amenities in Bemidji. We used the hot tub multiple times and would recommend bringing flip flops. Would return in winter and would like to try a summer or fall visit!
Everything was great, just as advertised.

Carla was wonderful. Very welcoming and hospitable. She had a really awesome breakfast basket of goodies for us. There were spa slippers for us to use and chocolates on the nightstand in the bedroom. It's little things like this that make all the difference. The hot tub was awesome. The whole place was spotless. Carla was there whenever we needed something or had a question. The view is breathtaking. Enjoyed watching the squirrels and a small deer even came up to eat the food that fell from the bird feeder. 5 star for sure.

Wonderful place to stay. My boyfriend and I went away to recharge and this was just the place. Romantic and peaceful. Hot tub was an amazing amenity in the winter weather. Definitely would go there again. Host was very nice and gave good directions to get to her place (google maps is very in accurate)

This place is just as described— A little bit of heaven. My husband and I came for a quick getaway and mini-moon. The hot tub and lake was exactly what we were looking for. The unit itself was super cozy, great layout, and had thoughtful amenities. The breakfast basket of goodies was especially nice.
The hot tub was perfectly clean and comfortable with plenty of towels. The bed was really comfortable, there were plenty of blankets and pillows, we slept so well! The living room was cozy with seating for probably 3 people and an electric fireplace that we used tor mostly ambiance but some heat after hot tub. The unit had a small kitchen/dining area and a really large bathroom. There were a couple games provided, we enjoyed the deck of cards and did not utilize the smart TV.
We saw some wildlife (deer, turkey) and Carla’s orange tabby cat Gizmo came to say hi each night while we were in the hot tub. He loved getting some pets. So cute.
Some notes if you come in the winter. The heat makes some odd noises from the kitchen area but nothing too distracting. And the temperature (set to 70) is not adjustable but the unit has windows that easy open.
Overall we loved our stay and Carla was a gracious and friendly hostess. I hope we can come back again sometime.

Amazing! Carla was super nice once we arrived. Prior to our weekend she contacted me, gave easy directions and responded quickly. It was smaller than we thought but still perfect. The hot tub on a chilly night was great! The view is amazing, with a large window in the front it’s easy to relax inside and watch the lake.

This place is breathtakingly beautiful. I was able to stay in the cabin with a friend over the summer and booked the hot tub for a romantic weekend in the snow. This did not disappoint. Carla is available if needed for anything and the snacks are off the hook. The place is clean, comfortable and cozy. I would highly recommend you give it a try.

This spot is great in every way. Carla was a great host; communicative, generous, available, and knowledgable. The location is great with lots of options for hiking and trails in under an hour's drive- also very close (about 10-15 minutes drive) to shops and restaurants in Bemidji! Although, you really can spend most of your time here with all the amenities offered. My husband and I enjoyed birdwatching on the deck while drinking our morning coffee and our evenings drinking wine and stargazing from the hot tub. 10/10 would recommend as a perfect couples getaway.

This place is very quiet and cozy and superbly decorated and spotless. Beautiful location and scenery. Many activities are offered for outside the cabin and inside.
The hostess was great in recommending places to eat.
We would stay here again.
Place is as advertised. Amazing, relaxing and beautiful!
Cozy little place on the lake. Absolutely beautiful, quiet location.

Carla is a great host. The cabin is immaculate inside and out. Easy access. Hot tub right outside the door amidst the pines was wonderful! The big deck in the front is a perfect spot for morning yoga, to sit in the sun, play games, and watch sunsets. The pictures don’t do this hideaway justice. It’s nicer than what you see online. We recommend this little bit of heaven to others and we hope to come back again.

Exactly as described! Peaceful, clean, all the amenities listed. Hot tub was our highlight! Although the dock & lake were a very close second! Fun pan fishing, catch and release (brought our own gear). Carla was a kind and friendly host but also left us alone to do our thing. She has fur babies we loved interacting with but if that's not your thing you can leave them be, too. Great stay. Recommend. Note the double bed might be small for larger people.
not disappointed
We loved our stay and would gladly return anytime! Beautiful and serene place, a perfect peaceful getaway!
This is a great private place to relax by the lake. Carla communicates well and is quick to resolve any issues
My husband and I came here for his birthday and we had such a wonderful time! Our favorite part was the outdoor hot tub & we really appreciated how clean the cabin was. We will definitely be back!
Carla was great to work with!
This little suite was very nice and comfy and there are some fun things to do around the area!
What a perfect location for a relaxing vacation. It was exactly what we were looking for to slow down and enjoy the summer.

Carla is an incredibly gracious and considerate host. She communicated well and even provided her personal number for questions regarding directions.
Her lakeside property is unbelievably gorgeous, surrounded by lush trees and gorgeous views. The Airbnb was clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. I highly recommend her Airbnb’s to anyone and would gladly stay in her spaces again.

Wonderful place to stay. The location is great, just a quick 15 minute drive to downtown Bemidji. The property is incredibly beautiful-the view of the lake through the trees is to die for! Everything inside was very clean and tidy and welcoming. The hot tub was an awesome bonus! Carla made everything incredibly easy for us, from accommodating a later check in time to being very quick to reply to any questions we had. She was very kind and made us feel welcome and comfortable! I would definitely recommend this place and would stay here again!

Enjoy the hot tub it’s worth every minute of your evening. Carla was great and very helpful for food suggestions. The lake was so quiet and serene. We did see some pretty big fish right off the dock. Definitely would recommend this property!!

Thank you for a wonderful week long vacation! The cabin was quite comfortable. The location was absolutely beautiful. The many amenities including the hot tub, deck, grill, dock, canoe, and the 2 brand new kayaks were fabulous (I’m certain I missed a few in my list!)! Thank you again for your gracious hospitality!
By far one of the most scenic and private locations in pure secluded lake and forest setting. We definitely will be staying every time we visit the Bemidji area!

My friend & I spent a great weekend staying here with beautiful views and lots to do without ever leaving the property. Carla was a great and accommodating host and was very helpful for the duration of our stay. Definitely would come back and I recommend this BnB to anyone looking for a peaceful getaway.
Cute laid back little town just minutes from the big city, lots to do on a very quiet and peaceful lake! We had a great weekend!!
great place, beautiful views! Carla is amazing!

If you’re looking for a beautiful getaway, this place is definitely for you! Carla was so friendly and gave us many suggestions on where to eat and visit. I would recommend this stay to anyone and we are hopeful to return in the future! Amazing hot tub and gorgeous view of Grant lake!
Great place for a relaxing weekend getaway! Hot tub was awesome! Views were also amazing!!
Perfect for a secluded, low-key stay. Carla was an amazing host who went above and beyond. Cozy little space! Several state parks in the area with great trails. Can't wait to return.
Cute, stylish little place with a SPECTACULAR hot tub with a SPECTACULAR view! A lovely little nature spa getaway.

Wow! What a cozy place! Carla was very responsive and a great host. The space has all the basics and the hot tub is so relaxing to enjoy in such a quiet, serene location. Also really appreciate the accessible, step free entrance!
Carla was a wonderful host. Super responsive and the place is beautiful. Loved the hot tub looking over the lake. We plan to stay again!
Amazing place to stay, with an amazing view!
A very cozy and relaxing stay. Peaceful location and the hot tub is very nice!
Carlas place was perfect for a quick relaxing weekend getaway!
Great little space to stay! Close to the city so there is many things to do!
An awesome cozy place to stay

We had an absolutely fantastic weekend! Carla is a great host! The perfect balance of friendly and accommodating to make it a special experience, but let us have our privacy and space to ourselves. Strongly recommend staying here!

Such a cute, quiet, and north woods oasis. Perfect for a romantic getaway, or just to unplug for a day or two. Hot tub was the best part! Everything was very clean, and host was gracious with a breakfast basket and quick communication. Definitely would stay here again!
a beautiful view and peaceful getaway from the cities! close to Bemidji but far enough out for lowkey recharge vacation time!
Our weekend at Carla's was absolutely amazing. It was exactly what we needed. Very private. Secluded up in the big pines.

Phenomenal stay! Wonderful private getaway with my wife. Spectacular views of the lake. Made a little skating rink on the frozen lake. Relaxing and high quality hot tub. Very comfortable bed and excellent customer care by Carla. The place is incredible! I cannot recommend it enough!

A cozy little nook amongst the pine trees. Our first night we got lost after driving through a post blizzard snowy day, Carla helped us navigate to her little hide-a-way in the woods. She was really patient and even stayed on the phone with me to make sure I got to her. After we arrived the hot tub was all set and we enjoyed a soak under the stars. Carla gave us lots of privacy and I felt like we basically had the place to ourselves, yet she was quick to communicate with any questions I had. The place itself is nicely located for some up north adventures, close to Bemidji and Lake Itasca. The kitchen was just enough to do some quick meals and Carla was sweet enough to leave a giant basket of goodies for us in the morning. I wish I had one more day.
Wonderful stay in the Bemidji area! Beautiful scenery and serene atmosphere
Great place- hope tp be going back!

My husband and I stayed at Carla’s amazing little slice of heaven and thoroughly enjoyed our visit. Everything was perfect—from the peaceful lake view flanked by gorgeous redwoods to the spacious, luxurious, squeaky clean hot tub to the friendly and handsome kitties who also seemed to enjoy our company as much as we did theirs (outside, not in the unit). Carla was lovely and helpful, providing restaurant recommendations and suggesting we enjoy the beautiful fall weather with a trip to nearby Itasca State Park, home to the headwaters of the Mississippi River. We literally just left and can’t wait to return.

I believed I’d be staying in a house by myself, not a small area off the main house that the host lives in. Photos made it look like it was the house and porch area that would be available, but that wasn’t the case. Tiny tv that didn’t work unless it was tinkered with. Kitchen with tiny fridge that wasn’t on when we got there. No oven. A tiny table to eat at. Twin size bed, very uncomfortable for myself and my girlfriend to sleep on. The only good thing about the place was the view of the lake, and the hot tub, although the hot tub was overlooked by what appeared to be the hosts living room(?) so that was awkward.
Way overpriced for what was really only the hot tub that we enjoyed. We left after less than 24 hours of being there cuz there was nothing to do except drink and use the hot tub. We had the place for 2 nights.
Carla's home is tucked away on a beautiful lake. It is close to several beautiful parks and the hot tub was a wonderful addition! We would definitely stay here again!

My partner and I were looking for a spot for a little weekend get away and Carla’s place was absolutely perfect. Wonderful view of the lake and such a peaceful setting. We loved the hot tub, fire pit and canoe which were all included with our stay. One of our favorite things was hearing the wind blow through the tall tree tops. It was also nice to have access to a grill and charcoal. Carla had everything we could possibly need available to us and it was so sweet that she had a welcome basket with snacks waiting for us on our arrival. Carla was very friendly and greeted us when we got there as well as showed us around the property. The bed was comfortable and the space was great for two people. Perfect place for a relaxing weekend in the woods!
Carla was a great host. The place was very clean, the hot tub was relaxing. The lake was beautiful to canoe on, but we forgot our fishing rods, don't make the same mistake 🙂.

Sparkling lake views...sparkling clean...loved the hot tub right outside our door!! Carla was great in sharing a bit of history with us and recommended Itasca State part...which was full of fall foliage beauty...!! We had everything we needed to enjoy a relaxing quiet getaway....
Carla was a wonderful host and the space was gorgeous! The ability to use the hot tub and the lake view made this a great place to relax.

It was beautiful. Great space for a weekend away! Close to a few local attractions but a great place to just stay and enjoy the scenery and natural beauty. We loved it. Definitely would recommend this location!

We can't say enough great things about Carla's place. It was a perfect little hideaway for us and we really enjoyed our time. The lakeview is beautiful and we had full access to the deck overlooking the water. We also enjoyed taking a canoe out on the lake and stargazing from the dock at night. The hot tub was very nice and so clean with so many jets- we really enjoyed relaxing in this. Carla was so thoughtful with providing a breakfast basket and a bottle of wine when we arrived. She knew we were celebrating our anniversary, and we were pleasantly surprised. We can't think of anything we would have changed about our stay and definitely recommend to a couple looking for a sweet and clean place to stay.

A perfect private getaway. Carla was very responsive to our requests. The variety of breakfast foods was wonderful. The facilities offered were awesome, from the private hot tub to dock. We had a wonderful time.

This was a beautiful place to stay! The lake view, trees, flowers, and hummingbirds were lovely and relaxing. We really enjoyed the hot tub with the beautiful view! This was probably the best part. Carla is friendly, helpful, and welcoming, and she has a beautiful lake retreat!

Carla's place is a wonderful getaway! We loved how private it feels, and still she's right there and responsive if you need anything. We will definitely be back to take in the peaceful lake property and unwind again. Whether it's a swim in the lake or a dip in the hot tub, don't forget your swimwear!

Carla‘s place was just beautiful with the pines and the lake. We saw Loons and Eagles! Hummingbirds were everywhere. A little bit of heaven, indeed! When we arrived, we were given scones, a food basket, and a surprise bottle of wine for our 40th anniversary! Carla‘s place was just perfect for a couple, and we had a very restful and relaxing stay.

A Little Bit of Heaven was was a charming suite in the woods overlooking Grant Lake. Carla was a gracious hostess and made sure we had everything we needed including a welcome breakfast/snack basket, linens, kitchenette, microwave, TV, etc. The suite was very clean and well-kept. A hot tub, canoe fire pit and charcoal grill were also available for use. We enjoyed a relaxing stay at the suite and would recommend it.

True to the listing, Carla’s Airbnb was truly a slice of heaven! The suite provided more than enough room for my partner and I and amenities aplenty. Very close to BSU. Nice, clean place to stay. The bed is comfy too! There was some noticeable noise from upstairs, not anything more than a family doing their daily routine. Which also means it was quiet by 9pm. I would stay here again.

The house is much more cozy than I thought and the surroundings are beautiful.Although I only stayed for one night, the host gave me a lot of travel tips nearby, thank you very much, I will stay again if I have the opportunity.
The clean room and kitchenette are fully equipped, just a few minutes walk from Bermigi Lake, one of the things was great.

We had a comfortable stay at Jo's place. Quiet at night. Everything as pictured. Other guests were there but we saw them once. It's great to take a walk on the lake shore! Many fine restaurants close by.
Clean room, kitchenette & bathroom. Very accommodating hosts!

Great location, worth the extra bucks to be so close to campus and downtown. We drove in at night and it was a little bit hard to find the house in the dark since the neighborhood is pretty residential but Jo’s directions were clear and easy to follow. The host came down to make sure we had the correct WiFi information and knew where extra towels could be found when we arrived as well.

What a great location - front yard overlooks Lk Bemidji!! And a really spacious apt, equipped kitchen. Good WiFi. Mike greeted me in person and was very gracious helping me in. I hope someday I can come back and stay longer.

The time I spent staying here was wonderful. Hospitality was great, I enjoyed talking with the host and her family. Room has a lot of space which is what I needed, a lot of thoughtful touches in the room, bedding and supplies. Really convenient environment, kitchen and bathroom are right there. CLEAN room and COMFORTABLE bed. Another thing I loved about staying here is how close it is to downtown, BSU campus and the lake, literally steps away. Host was knowledgeable and generous to share tips on visiting around. Highly recommend this place to stay!

Cute space in a great location. Didn’t get to meet Jo as she was away, but everything was well described so self-service was easy. And getting to do my laundry was fantastic! Would readily stay again.
Hosts are great and friendly note; don't plan on sleeping in on the weekends if your a lite sleeper. You will hear kids running around above you. Didn't bother me but it might bother some folks.
Great location on the lake.
Good place for location and value

Great location! So close to downtown shopping Paul Bunyan and Babe and eating locations. Skip your diet and treat yourself to a River Spoon ice cream. Why not make it a double in a waffle cone? Right across the street from Paul. The lake is only a short distance from the house and the walking trail is well kept.
The studio room is perfect for even a lunch ne’er stay. Mike was so helpful and made sure we had everything we needed. I wish we could’ve taken advantage of the Chinese breakfast they offered but we had other plans.
Josefina is a great host.

After nights of being in motels near roads, and where workers get up super early, it was nice to wake up in a quiet neighborhood. You can wake up and go for a walk along the lake and to the downtown area. We were just there basically to get a good night rest before a long drive. So didn’t have any time to interact with the hosts, but Josephine’s husband was very nice when he let us in and showed us the space.

We love the fact that it was right on Bemidji Lake! The views were beautiful! We were able to walk a short distance to a couple of nice restaurants. It was very quiet and we were able to get good rest.
Josefina is a great host. Nice quiet, clean space with a very comfortable bed.

I loved the location was within walking distance to downtown Bemidji. I enjoy the art gallery two blocks away. The basement room was spacious with no TV, however, great WiFi access. Everything was clean. The access to the bathroom is out side of the room. The hosts were able to text me quickly the answers to the questions I asked. I found the room to be a good value.
This is a cozy place in a great location and is very reasonably priced. We have stayed here before and will likely visit again.
If you want a quiet restful night close to town, this is a great choice. Centrally located, in a large white historic home along the lake.
I stayed in the "Moose" room. But the coffee provided was from Caribou! Spacious basement room. Comfortable bed and fast wi-fi. Small bathroom. Great value in basic accommodation.

My stay was short but just right to get a good night's sleep last minute.
The home is right on the lake and within walking distance of downtown Bemidji.
This is a gem and a great value. The space has everything you need minus a TV..But you don't travel to use a TV anyway. Great communication and easy check-in. I look forward to staying here again when in town! Book your stay Today! 😉
Nice place quiet

Super cute house right on the lake. I'm sure it's beautiful in summer. We were only in town for one night to catch a BSU hockey game, and the room was perfect for our needs - clean, quiet and private. Would definitely stay again.
Affordable and excellent location.
Everything was as advertised.
This place is nice and really affordable. It’s close to the lake and downtown as well. Would stay at this place again
Jo's place was great. She and her husband are very accommodating hosts.
Josefina and Micheal were wonderful host. Thank you again.
Great place to stay. Josefina was very welcoming.
Accurate and pleasant. Highly recommended.

A great location right on the lake, an easy walk to downtown Bemidji, and a local park that happened to be hosting a big Dragon Boat Festival.
Josefina and her husband were very helpful and friendly, obviously taking pride in the service they offer, voluntarily refunding us part of our stay because the air mattress they provided for our daughter ended up having a bad leak in it.

A very spacious room with just the right breakfast items for me and a very comfortable bed. The location is excellent - walking distance to the heart of downtown, right next to the lake and close to the main park. I took in the Dragon Boat Races and Corn Hole competition before dining at Fozzie's BBQ. A very good eatery with dirt cheap drinks and super-friendly owner and staff.
Great stay! Very comfortable and spacious room. Perfect kitchenette and couch area - definitely would book this stay again. Thanks Jo!

Lovely room with kitchenette, and a shared bathroom. The place is spacious and beautiful and location is great. Really enjoyed walking around the lake area and town. I would definitely stay here again if I come back to Bemidji.

Great value for lots of space in a quiet neighborhood. Cool basement on a hot summer day. As it is a shared house you will hear the family move around upstairs, but it didn't bother us at all. Flexible and welcoming host.

Great location!!!!!! The park, the lake, Paul and Blue, eateries, coffee houses, etc. Park the car and leave it parked.
As described... The accommodations were wonderful, studio-like atmosphere with plenty of room.
You won't be disappointed...
Very pleased with the room provided! Very close to Paul and Babe the Big Blue Ox!

This is the second time in a month that myself and family have stayed in Josefina's home,
We stayed in two different rooms, the room this time is in the basement so stays nice and cool on the warmer days. It is very spacious, she has created a studio apartment feel, a bit more modern than her upstairs room that we stayed in last time, but I love both for different reasons. She is very willing to communicate I was new to Airbnb, she answered all of my inquiries promptly.
Love the location walking distance to downtown Bemidji, and basically right on the lake.

The host was very helpful and accommodating. The room is very large; the bed is very comfortable and there is a lovely kitchenette. The room is in the basement but the decorations and special touches the host has added to the room make it a very warm and welcoming place to stay.

Josefina and her family are friendly, accommodating and communicative host. They stocked the fridge with breakfast food and plenty of tea and coffee options. The space is clean and the bed is very comfortable. The room is just as described, spacious enough to even host friends over. I love having everything all in one big room. The studio room and bathroom are very private. Their location can't be beaten, and I had one of the nicest morning walk along the lake. As an added bonus, even though it was a hot summer day, as hot as Bemidji can possibly get, this room in the basement is very cool! I also opt for the Chinese breakfast option, being a Chinese myself, her food reminded me of home and my mom's cooking. It sure could be a fun cultural experience for anyone, as well as a delicious and healthy home made meal.

Very comfortable and relaxing stay with a homey feel and welcoming hostess. We were away during the days doing some hiking and sightseeing, but it would have been great to have another night there to enjoy the property more fully. We also really appreciated access to laundry facilities. Would stay here again if returning to Bemidji!
Great place to get away! It fit our needs perfectly! Great host communication 😊

Abbi was the perfect hostess. She is delightfuland responsive! The setting for her BnB was beautiful and tranquil. It would be a good place to just go and kick back for a week or two. The bed was comfortable and we had everything we needed.
We were there such a short time.
We loved our stay at Abbie’s beautiful home and would definitely stay again!
Abbi was great and we enjoyed our stay.

Wonderful quiet and comfortable space for our weekend stay while helping elder parents with accessibility tasks. Wished we could have spent more time by the river! Next time hopefully. Thanks for helping us have an afford place where we could retreat during our stay.
Very nice and responsive host!

We did not feel entirely comfortable upon entry. We were surprised at the political and religious imagery in the stairwell, which was not pictured in the listing. I knew from photos that there would be some, but I could not have anticipated the extent. Of course, the host is welcome to decorate their home however they wish! But if I’d known I would not have chosen this Airbnb. I’m only including this in my review so that others are aware before booking. I would have felt entirely uncomfortable and perhaps unsafe walking into this space if visibly queer or a person of color. Additionally, we had no way to close off or lock the basement. The bathroom door lock was also not functional. The bedroom door locked but otherwise there was no way to ensure privacy. The host was friendly and the unit was clean! I only think the political and religious aspects should be clearly pictured in the listing so that guests can assess whether they’re comfortable with this BEFORE booking.
Abbi’s place was just as described. Great location out in the country next to the river. She was a very responsive host.
Abbi was a wonderful host for my stay in Bemidji.
This was the first time I had used Airbnb and Abbi set the bar high for the next time I use it.

I had a lovely stay at Abbi's. I was looking for a peaceful, private place to crash for a couple of nights, and it was just that. She had very detailed, proactive instructions. There was a common room with fridge and microwave, and even a ping pong table available! Everything was very clean. And great price and value!
Great communication! Very comfy space!! Perfect for a weekend stay in Bemidji!!!
Great place.
what a gorgeous setting.
Very nice place! I am in love with resident golden!
Nice atmosphere, comfortable bed, and the drive is pretty.
The space was as described. Peaceful and quiet. Comfortable bed ! We enjoyed our stay!
Abbi’s place is exactly what my wife and I want in an Airbnb! It was super clean, had clear instructions, was very peacefully, and even had the friendliest dog!

Both the place and the host were great. Abbi was always very responsive. Enjoyed watching the river flow past in the early mornings or evenings. Very peaceful. Perfect spot for our trip to MN to visit family.

Lovely space off the beaten path. Lake views, dirt road and sounds of the woods. I loved landing there. Abbi is great and Kidji the dog is amazing. Highly recommend this place.
Thanks Abbi.

what a fabulous location!
Abbi was always responsive.
you have a ton of space in her basement. backyard being on the Mississippi River is awesome. it is about 10-12 minutes drive away from most Bmidji, but absolutely worth it for the seclusion and the view.
I worked remotely for a days and the internet was great.

This is a great place to stay in the area! We settled here after traveling from Medora, ND. It was so roomy and very comfortable. Abbi’s place was perfect for us to begin our trip south on the Great River Road.
Had a short, but comfortable & restful stay at Abbi’s. She was attentive to my needs and helpful local recommendations.
Great place to spend a night on my roadtrip! Abbi was super helpful in showing me around the place!

We greatly enjoyed staying with Abbi. The place was more than we had envisioned - a great bonus was the friendliness of the host! Abbi is extremely caring and friendly. She does everything in her power to ensure that her guests are feeling great in her home and that they lack nothing. It was a pleasure to stay at her place. We had everything we needed. We enjoyed the rustic and the quietness of the place. Being the 4th of July, we had wanted something somewhat secluded and this was the place. Still, very close to the city - only a couple miles away - but far enough to get the quietness we had wanted. The dog was extremely friendly and our son was overjoyed to see it! Overall, a wonderful experience - if our paths would take us again to Bemidji, we would love to stay at Abbi's place again! Thank you, Abbi! Till we see each other again!

Abbi’s place was perfect. She was very responsive and friendly, and gave me directions to sights I requested. The bed was very comfortable and the lower level of the home was private and quiet. I would love to stay again.

I was in the Bemidji area for 5 days doing scuba diving work for the county in different lakes each day. I could not have picked a better place to stay during my time there! Abbi's lovely home was so peaceful and comfortable - she thinks of everything. Abbi's communication was top notch and it was apparent she has concern for her guests and wants them to feel comfortable. I loved the coziness of the "TV room" as well as the big open room where I was able to do Zoom workout classes. The kitchenette area had enough dishes and bits and pieces for me to make food every day. Abbi was also immensely accommodating with me and all my crazy scuba gear! I will be returning to the area again this summer, and likely annually for the same work - I hope to stay at Abbi's again if it's open! (Special shout out to Kitchi the pup - such a sweetie!)

fabulous host!! Even the doggie was so friendly. very private and pieceful. the added touches of being a proud American citizen and the blessings of the lord was absolutely perfect. she also had fresh flowers in the bedroom smelled so refreshing!! look forward to staying with her once again!!
Abbie’s place is as described and is on large peaceful lot on the lovely Mississippi.
Abbi thought of everything! Clear instructions. Lovely North country modern decor. I welcoming property on the river.
Wonderful home with wonderful people.
My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay! The Airbnb was just as described and located on the beautiful Mississippi River.

Wonderful, stay, very quiet and lots of room. Good communication with host very nice place with fun play area under the steps. My kids would’ve enjoyed when they were younger. We had a very short stay but we’re very happy with the accommodations. Loved your coffee bar set up wish we would’ve had more time to enjoy the river and your beautiful landscaping. Thanks again.

I enjoyed my stay at Abbi’s place. Beautiful and quiet setting- loved just standing by the river to take in the peaceful surroundings. Their dog was super sweet and friendly too- I wished I’d had time to play with him! A clean, charming basement suite which was a restful place to stay while attending a conference in the area. Overall would definitely recommend!

We really enjoyed meeting the host. She was very friendly and gave us good suggestions where to visit and what to see. We especially liked all the little details in the house, historical pieces of furniture, art, posters and such. For our son there was a play area and Roku TV. The backyard is right on the river, I had great time birdwatching.

As a whole, the stay went very smoothly, and I truly had privacy in the basement of the home and had minimal interaction with the owner and her family. She was readily available when communicating with her and the space was in great shape. Definitely worth the price.
Abby was very pleasant, greeted me and visited with me. I highly recommend that if you just need a calming place with friendly people you have it here. I'd come back for sure.
It was my second stay here and I’ll be back. It’s always clean, quiet, and comfortable. A great place to stay!

My suite was exactly as described. I would definitely stay with Abbi the next time that I'm in Bemidji. It was very accessible to the Sanford Center & downtown restaurants. I recommend the Minnesota Nice Cafe.
The place was as described and very clean.
Very understanding….
it was a nice places to get sleep!
Clean, quiet, and out of the way- it was exactly what I was looking for!

Very pleasant stay. Remote, peaceful, relaxing, comfortable.
Abbi us very responsive and pro-active.
A wonderful place to stay. And a friendly wonderful hostess.

I stayed at Abbys place many times in the last few months while in Bemidji for work. She offers an excellent price and the place is true to the pictures and explanation given in the listing. I am sure I will stay again soon:) thank you Abby! I always appreciate your warm hospitality!

Abbi is a very friendly and welcoming hostess who responds quickly to any communication. Her basement accommodation is spacious and has many creative touches. At the northern most point of the Mississippi river, her home is in a scenic and very quiet area. I would highly recommend her facility to anyone looking for a quiet stay in a lovely setting.
Always a great stay!
Abby is always kind to me to makes me feel welcomed.

Abbi's place was perfect for our stay. It was about 5 miles from DT Bemidji, on the eastside of the lake, but it was easy to navigate even with a recent snow storm. The entry is private with a digital lock and the space downstairs was just as described. We had fun playing ping pong in our free time! They have a very friendly dog and we are dog people, so we loved it. The dog stayed outside and greeted us often. Big bark, but sweet as can be :)
Abbi is a very friend and helpful host. My daughter left a ring and Abbi was nice enough to mail it to us after finding it!!!
We will certainly stay with Abbi again when we visit Bemidji!
Always a great stay!
beautuful place, very peaceful.
Great stay:)
Another great stay!
Clean and comfortable as always! Thank you Abbi!
Abbi always makes my stays easy and comfortable!

My stay was fine overall. The house is a couple miles down a dirt/gravel road, which wasn’t mentioned in the description. The basement is spacious, but the upstairs footsteps are loud in the bedroom. They seemed to honor their quiet times, which was nice. Overall a good enough value.
Always a great, easy stay!

The space was a nice place to stay during our one night in town. Everything was clean and as advertised.
However, if I had know the stairwell leading into the basement was a giant American flag and with photocopies of the US constitution on the wall, I wouldn't have booked the room. There's also a golden retriever on the property. While the owner gave us the heads up it was going to be out when we arrived and was friendly, it absolutely didn't act or sound friendly. I don't recommend arriving at night. Would have been nice if they'd sealed the garage dog door.

Spacious, lovely basement space, replete with ping pong table. Lots of amenities and consideration were evident. It was a bit further from Bemiji than anticipated, but that may have been our GPS routing. Wonderful Airbnb.
Beautiful spacious accommodation’s in a lovely setting.
Always a great stay!
Nice quiet place by the river.
Abbi communicated very well and made everything as simple as can be! We really enjoyed our stay and the wonder scenery!
Great place to stay, just out of town. Great biking, and great town.
Had such a great stay at Abbi‘s house. Communication was great, rooms were nice and very clean. Hope to come back to Bemidji one day.

This place is EXTREMELY clean and spacious! The basement space is very private and feels like you have a separate house. Also the backyard views are incredible! Abbi was so sweet and helpful. Would 1000% stay again :)
AMAZING! don’t look anywhere else, book here NOW!!! Canoes, tv, ping pong, comfortable bed, everything you’d need. beautiful place. Abbi is great.
This place!!! So clean and cozy!!! We were able to enjoy some canoeing, and a walk with Kitchi, their dog. She pays great attention to detail. This truly is a peaceful gem.

Abbi’s place & hospitality were great. I enjoyed my stay and felt welcomed. Abbi was easy to communicate with, and the place was clean & comfortable. Will continue to book with Abbi when I come to Bemidji for work:)
lovely spot right on the mississippi river. went for a beautiful paddle and enjoyed abbi and the cute doggos company! great value and a nice spot to enjoy the northwoods

Abbi was very nice and accommodating. The location was great and parking is available. They have a sweet dog that greets you near the premises. The place you stay is in the basement and it is clean and had a modern feel mixed with the rural hardwood feel of the property. One of the beds had sheets that smelled a bit stale or as if someone slept in them recently. But it wasn’t an issue we just used their available washer and dryer to solve the issue. No problem. The house is very quiet. Abbi is great!

What a wonderful gem! Abbi is a warm and generous hostess and added beautiful personal touches to our lodging. We felt at home and enjoyed the beautiful scenery of the river and yard as well as Abbi's piano playing. Thank you Abbi!

Abbi was super sweet and had the check in down to a science. And a nice place! Great job, thank you!
Micah
Beautiful location and sweet dog!

Abbi’s space was very quiet, clean, comfortable and spacious, exactly as described. My aunt stayed in the bedroom, and said the bed was very comfortable. She loved the fresh flowers that Abbi set out. I slept on a pull out mattress, also very comfy. The basement is cool - great for sleeping. There is a space heater available if needed. Being right on the Mississippi River offered a new perspective of this great river. Thank you Abbi for the stay!
Abbi was very kind. Also I really love their family dog! Such a cute pooch.
Perfect experience. Abbi is responsive, the rooms are comfortable. Abbi has nice instructions posted. We stayed one night and really appreciated the value.
Abbi graciously booked us at the very last moment. The space was very clean and comfortable. No negatives.

Abby’s beautiful peaceful apartment was exactly what I needed for the four days I was in the area! Very nicely finished and convenient. Surrounded by the cozy charm that this sweet lady has created. She offered the perfect balance of privacy and availability as a hostess! I would book her place again!

This is a very beautiful place to stay! Great beds and pillows. Condo was well stocked with kitchen necessities to make cooking more convenient. They also have decent shampoo/conditioner and body wash. Incredible deck and view of lake Bemidji. About a 15 minute drive to anything in town. We had a very comfortable stay! Would easily recommend to family and friends!
condo was exactly what they said it would be. clean, great lake, dock amazing, chair on end of dock amazing!! the biggest deck I've ever seen for a 4 shared condo unit. all around good good good!!
Beautiful lake view.
Was as expected and fair price. No concerns, would stay again!
Great place to stay. Quiet, cozy, and comfortable. We were in town for an athletic tournament and had a nice quiet retreat to rest and chill at.
beautiful place as confusing at times with communication but was a great stay:)
What a beautiful location, overlooking the lake and nature. Cozy and comfortable and minutes away from town. A value price for this location!

The place was quiet and what we needed for the time we were there.
Cons:
The carpets need to be cleaned...there were several stains on it, along with the two chairs and couch in the living room and it appeared to looked dirty. A few of the towels for the bathroom were dirty and or stained, but the one had a blood spot on it...I would suggest getting colored towels instead. The master bathroom shower is small, so a shower nozzle that could detach would be nice. Installing deadbolts on the units would be a nice added security at night, instead of just the lock system...anyone that knows the code can just use it and walk in. The fridge made an awful sound when it would kick on to cool.
Pros:
The beds were nice and comfy, the decorations are very cute and the overall stay was nice and it would be great in the summer!
Amazing stay! Looking forward to booking this in the future again ￼!
This place was perfect, just as described. Clean and very spacious, will definitely be back again!
Great place to stay, I would come back here again!
Stayed pretty much entire month of December—loved it!! Would highly recommend!!! Very convenient and awesome views!!
Stayed here multiple times/always come back!!
Fantastic location/quiet with spectacular views of the lake. Liked so much we are staying again in a few days!! Highly recommended.

We had a lovely stay at Breezy Hills over Thanksgiving. A cozy and peaceful home in a scenic setting, we felt truly comfortable. An underrated feature is the thermostat in every room for individualized climate control, especially nice in the chilly Northern Minnesota November. Thank you for a great stay!
Great place, we loved staying right next to the bike trail!

This location was absolutely perfect! The apartment was also spotless and super clean. There were great amenities and it helped to have the full kitchen and space. You could tell there was so much thought and care put into the details too. The view and watching sunrise/sunset from the docks and deck were also fantastic. We will try to return another time of year to enjoy a slightly warmer season too. Many thanks to the Breezy Hills Family for their hospitality!
We appreciated the space, location and setting. The conditioned water was fantastic and something you don’t get many places. Thank you kindly for being responsive to our messages!!
Wonderful hosts! When I arrived, I noticed a book of recommendations and places to check out in the Bemidji area. Responsive hosts and the environment was clean.

Great location on the lake! The huge deck overlooking the lake was a perfect place to watch the Northern Lights, too! Would be a good place to come back to and spend more time. We were only in town for two nights this time and had a busy schedule with family. This was a retreat to recharge each evening.

I had a great three night stay here; I was traveling for work and wanted to enjoy the natural area more than a hotel would provide and I was not disappointed! The grounds and easy access to the lake and the Paul Bunyan trail was fantastic! I loved sitting on the dock or large shared porch to watch the sunset, which was stunning each night. The rental was clean and comfortable and so close to downtown. The bed in the master is also super comfy! I would stay here again!
Great place for a family vacation! The views are stunning and cannot be beat. It was close to town while still feeling like we had privacy and could relax.
I highly recommend Breezy Hills and all the options they have to both stay and have fun! Great hosts and very accommodating! I will be back! :)
Great place to stay! Would definitely come back!
Beautiful, comfortable place with many activities nearby including safe trails for running/walking.
clean and comfortable. we had lots of stuff to do.
Great place. Great “bang for your buck”. Comfortable and cozy home. If you’re ready this. It’s a good spot to pick
Lovely decor , beautiful location ! Will definitely stay here again .
Clean, quiet place - as described. Hosts were responsive and amenable to a late checkout. Lovely view of the lake - even though frozen!

We enjoyed our stay. The sunsets were beautiful. Great location for snowmobiling right off the Paul Bunyan trail was a huge plus! The only down fall were the beds. We found them to be very hard and uncomfortable.
Overall we had a great time!

Had a great stay, bud sadly picked the coldest days of the year for our time there. Hey, you can’t control weather, right? Some small issues getting into the unit, however, the staff was very responsive in getting things sorted out. I would definitely recommend this unit to others and would be happy to stay there again, perhaps when it’s a little warmer. All and all, it was a great experience.
This was a fantastic place right on the lake that was very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!

Book this place and you will have no regrets. Our stay was magical. The sunsets are amazing (as good as Hawaii). The condo is spacious with great outdoor amenities. This was the highlight of our vacation. The hosts respond quickly to any needs. The guest book is full of good information. We tried the Green Mill restaurant and it was amazing! Next time we hope to stay longer and hit all the recommended restaurants. PS be sure to enjoy the chairs at the end of the dock especially for a sunset or two.
We enjoyed this lovely condo. Clean, easy access and beautiful setting

We had a great stay here. The unit was very clean and on a great location on the lake. Easy access to anything in Bemidji, but a feeling of being removed from it. Brothers are very prompt in responding if you need anything. Definitely would stay here again if in Bemidji area.

The condo is very nice, in an absolutely prime location. The sunset on the lake was amazing, and we could watch it from either the large deck overlooking the lake, or from the deck of the unit, or even from the couch in the living room. The unit is very clean, the interior design is clever and relaxing. Mississippi River exits the lake 200 feet from the condo, and I had an awesome experience going down there using one of the kayaks on the premises. Paul Bunyan trail is basically in the front yard. Grocery stores are fairly close.
The hosts are very responsive. We needed some extra blankets and the host dropped them at the unit promptly. will definitely try and book this unit again next time we are in Bemidji.
I enjoyed the kayaks they keep on the property, a nice bonus to my stay!
A great place on the lake with room to play on the lake and in the lawn. Kick back in the deck and enjoy the sunset! Thanks for everything!
Great location! Kids loved it!!
Beautiful place in a wonderful and peaceful location. very well equipped, with everything we needed. Hosts were super responsive and friendly in interactions. Highly recommend!
We loved staying at your property! The peacefulness was amazing and loved the decor and space of the unit. Sunsets were awesome! Looking forward to coming again!

We had an excellent stay over the long 4th of July weekend! The location seriously cannot be beat for lakeside views and your classic Minnesota weekend Up North.
The lake is about 3 feet deep for a long way past the pier and mostly sand, so it's perfect for swimming, tubing, and kayaking (and they have kayaks you can use). The yard is nice and open with a couple of spots to hang the hammock as well as play lawn games. There are also a couple of bonfire spots, plenty of firewood, and lots of outdoor lounging options.
Even over the holiday, the lake and neighborhood were a lot calmer and quieter than I expected. The fireworks were great and you have a great view from the pier. This condo is one of four with a shared entrance lobby, but you still have lots of privacy and you can't hear much from the other units. The other guests were considerate and fun to chat with.
The condo seems recently remodeled and in really nice shape. The decor was updated and cozy. The beds are GREAT, which was a huge plus. Since it's a newer rental, there were a few kitchen things missing, but the hosts were very responsive and brought over a ton of stuff the next morning. They checked in to make sure things were going well, and are very eager to ensure your stay is top-notch!
We had a blast and would definitely stay here again.

This was truly an amazing stay. I have stayed at other places in Bemidji and this place is the best. Way better than a resort or hotell.
I loved the beautiful decoration. The pictures truly do not do this place justice.
literally on the water and on the PB trail.

Easy to find. Beautiful spacious place just feet from the lake. Kitchen nicely stocked for cooking. Great views of wildlife around the cabin. Porcupine, deer, waking up to ducks and loons on the lake. Quick drive into Bemidji.

Wonderfull house literally feet from the beach. Although we stayed in the off season, we enjoyed the peace and tranquility of the northern lakes just miles from Bemidji. I would recommend this place for couples as well as families that are looking for the perfect northern getaway!

Such a beautiful home on the lake! We spent a long weekend here enjoying time with lifelong friends playing canasta, going to a football game & enjoying the outdoors. Great location, beautiful home and amazing hosts. Loved the game room for the kids.
Great place for a group! It was very nice and clean and the beds we’re comfortable! We’d stay here again!

It was a very beautiful two-story house in a quiet neighborhood. It had all the accommodations you could think of. The weather was below freezing but there was a fireplace that they left instructions for us to use. I highly recommend if you want a home away from home!
This fresh new place is a fantastic place to stay in Bimidji. The fireplace added a extra special touch. Wonderful hosts. Looking forward to staying there again.
Wonderful host wonderful location Bemidji has so much to offer

We are repeat renters and thrilled with both stays. Great hosts, welcoming home, and beautiful surroundings. Highly recommend Miles and Brenda’s place. This will be the first one we look for next time we visit Bemidji!
Cozy, clean home with a beautiful lawn and access to the river. The firepit and patio/deck was wonderful. The space was perfect for our group of 4.

Miles & Brenda’s home is wonderful!! It is a beautiful place to stay and very comfortable. They welcomed my family and gave us great information when we arrived. Also, they communicated well throughout the whole experience. I would love to stay again some day!

In the middle of our 10 day trip around Northern MN we decided to stay at state parks (with no running water or refrigeration) EXCEPT for this Airbnb to wash up and reset for the final leg of our tour. However, it ended up to be a terrible experience for the following reasons:
- The bathtub was painted and actively peeling, which meant we could not give our kids a bath safety. (And felt uneasily taking a shower with paint chips in our feet)
- There is a ~1 "step" up into the house and kitchen. Which posed a falling risk for our 1 year old (or anyone with mobility differences)
-The 2nd bedroom does not have a door and is right off the living room (via a stairwell), so it is bright and "loud" if you are talking when others are trying to sleep there.
- There are multiple places in the house that are a "work in progress". They are not painted or trim is missing.
- The child plug are missing in many outlets
- The location of the house is a bit tricky to find (and Google Maps doesn't get you there), so it would have been helpful to have the host preemptively send some information about finding it easier.
- The toilet seat that was replaced right before we arrived was not installed correctly, so we had to do it ourselves.
- The host said she would met us to "check us in" only to leave us waiting on the front deck and then text and say the door was open and the keys were inside.
- The host randomly stopped by to tell us to leave the keys on the table as we were trying to pack up our car and kids at check out time.
- When contacted by myself and Airbnb about our displeasure with our stay, Jill said she would "take our complaints to heart and that they know it is not the perfect place for a family with small children". However, this was never talked about in the listing.
- The host did not respond to Airbnb Support when trying to resolve these issues a second time through the Airbnb Resolution Center.
So, be warned! The house is not suitable for anyone children or mobility differences and wants to take a shower/bath. The host is not effective at communicating.
